Text: Ann Taylor Subscription ConfirmationThank you for subscribing to Ann Taylor email news and welcome to the Ann Taylor Online Store Your email subscription has been received In the coming weeks we will update you on events promotions and other exciting Ann Taylor news If you havent already registered with anntaylorcom would you like to create your own personal account When you register with anntaylorcom you can create a unique user name and password to take advantage of the following benefits Use our Express Checkout service to save time Save your Shopping Bag and Wardrobing Room selections Save addresses in your personal Address Book for future use To become a registered user click on or cut and paste the link below Memberstem Ann Taylors mission is to delight you Should you have any questions please visit Help at our Online Store or simply send an email to You can also call us anytime at DIALANN and a Client Associate will gladly assist you Thank you for your interest in the Ann Taylor Online Store Sincerely Andra B Ehrenkranz Senior Vice President Ann Taylor We are delighted to send you news about Ann Taylor If you do not wish to receive email messages from anntaylorcom in the future please reply to this email with unsubscribe in the subject line
